message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $20,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.  This is a very fair offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still only able to pay up to $12,000. Would this be acceptable to you?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I need to be realistic.  $14,000 is my absolute lowest price, as anything less would be selling myself short. This product is truly worth it.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and I respect the value of the product. I am willing to go up to $13,000. Is this within your range?
